name: End Zone Defense Free Kick [GMTK Game Jam 2020]
name_original: End Zone Defense Free Kick [GMTK Game Jam 2020]
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020

*REQUIRES A CONTROLLER TO PLAY

Kick the balls at the opponents heading to the end zone. Prevent your opponents from scoring a touchdown (walking across the end zone line). Trying kicking a field goal for extra points.

Controls:

  • Left Stick - Move
  • Right Stick - Aim Up/Down Left/Right
  • A Button - Kick
  • Right Stick (R3) - Press down to reset your aim arrow

Credits:

Russ Moonbase - Code, Design, Models

Additional Assets/Credits:

  • Models made with Asset Forge https://assetforge.io/
  • Animations from Mixamo https://www.mixamo.com/
  • Music: Vertex Studios https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/absolutely-free-music-4883
  • Skybox: Borodar https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cl...
  • Font from Google Fonts: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Russo+One?query=russ
